title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5329.33 - Review, examination of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5329.33 - Review, examination of records

State Regulations

The commission or the commission's designee may: (a) conduct periodic examinations of the
accounting and financial records of operators; (b) review the accounting principles and
procedures used by operators; (c) review and observe methods and procedures used by operators to count and handle
wagers made with cash, vouchers, gaming chips or wagering tickets of
value; (d) examine accounting and
financial records of an operator or a person controlling, controlled by or
under common control with such operator; (e) obtain copies from the operator of
outstanding deposited check instruments, checks returned and held, collection
activities taken and settlement of disputed items. Notes

5329.33

New

York State Register June 26, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 26, eff. 6/26/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
